title: Suggestion on switching server
body: I am new to LoL and unfortunately start playing on Na server without Knowing which would be better server for me and i get around 300-350 ping, Recently i've checked ping on EUW and i get around 190-220 ping, I've reach level 25 here on Na and probably have 7-10 Champions, So do you guys think is it worth it to start New on other region to get 100-120 better ping?btw i know you can transfer your account with Riot points but don't wanna spend money, Waiting for your suggestions :)

replies.body: Thx you for your help :), I've tried to find the server IP's of different LoL servers before start playing  but couldn't find much then latter i had to send a ticket to actually ask for the server Ip's otherwise i would've never start on Na, So I don't wanna regret my decision after half or an year so i guess better to change my Region

Not wanting to spend riot points for a transfer is totally fine, but playing on a high ping totally sucks!  Based on your physical location, if another region would offer a better experience for you, then I think that would ultimately be the best option.  Even if that means making a new account.  Just in case, though, just hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!  It wouldn't hurt to see if we can help with your connection or other options!
